meanings.definition: The psychic and emotional energy associated with instinctual biological drives.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's intense libidos fueled his determination to win the race.
meanings.sent2: The artist poured her libidos into every brushstroke of the painting.

meanings.sent4: The stormy weather seemed to match the libidos of the angry crowd.
meanings.sent5: The music had a captivating libidos that moved the audience to dance.
